E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/2/1993
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
John Franco



Date: Tuesday, 6/3/1993
Subject: Progress of Ramon Morel
Dear Sir,
Ramon Morel has nothing more to prove at A Daytona Cubs!
He has an ERA of 3.99 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Hiromi Matsunaga

Regards,
Lee Guetterman
